code:
flowchart TD A["Start: Raw Data
4,255 + 3,199 features"] --> B["Keep columns with at least 3 replicates"] B --> C["Visualise missing values
Assess missingness patterns"] C --> D["Test for MCAR
Little's MCAR test"] D -->|"Not MCAR (P < 0.001)"| E["Test for MAR
Logistic Regression"] E -->|"MAR confirmed"| F["Impute missing data"] F --> G1["`R: Random Forest, PMM`"] F --> G2["`Python: kNN, Median, SVD, GPR, EM`"] G1 --> H["Evaluate imputation methods"] G2 --> H H --> I1["`EMD (Earth Mover's Distance)`"] H --> I2["`Hellinger Distance`"] H --> I3["`Richness, Shannon entropy,
Simpson's diversity, sparsity`"] H --> I4["`Q-Q, ECDF, KDE plots`"] I1 --> J["Select best method:
Random Forest
(Higher richness: 168 vs 156.9)"] I2 --> J I3 --> J I4 --> J J --> K["Outlier detection"] K -->|"Z-Score, IQR, Isolation Forest
Elliptic Envelope, Mahalanobis, Robust PCA"| M["Evaluate outlier detection methods"] M --> N1["`PCA and t-SNE visualisations`"] M --> N2["`30 most impacted variables plots`"] M --> N3["`Contamination threshold optimisation`"] N1 --> O["Select method: Isolation Forest
(Highest precision)"] N2 --> O N3 --> O O --> P["Remove outliers and
impute with Random Forest"] P --> Q["Data Transformation"] Q -->|"Log, Square Root, Box-Cox
Yeo-Johnson, asinh, glog, Anscombe"| S["Evaluate transformations"] S --> T1["`CV (0.876→0.206),
rMAD (67.98→14.28), rSD`"] S --> T2["`Shapiro-Wilk,
Anderson-Darling tests`"] S --> T3["`Density plots, MA-transform`"] T1 --> U["Variable Selection:
asinh transformation selected"] T2 --> U T3 --> U U --> V["Exclude variables with rMAD > 30%
(241 variables removed, 9.75%)"] V --> W["Clean Dataset: 2,471 features
Ready for PLS-DA selection"] W --> X["PLS-DA Feature Selection
VIP > 1.0 threshold"] X --> Y["Final High-Confidence Dataset
964 features for network analysis"] %% Style definitions classDef startEnd fill:#2e7d32,stroke:#1b5e20,stroke-width:2px,color:white,font-weight:bold classDef mainProcess fill:#4caf50,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:1.5px,color:white classDef evaluation fill:#66bb6a,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:1px,color:black classDef method fill:#a5d6a7,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:1px,color:black classDef decision fill:#81c784,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:1.5px,color:black %% Apply styles class A,Y startEnd class B,F,J,O,P,U,V,W,X mainProcess class C,H,M,S evaluation class G1,G2,I1,I2,I3,I4,N1,N2,N3,T1,T2,T3 method class D,E,K,Q decision
